dublin_core.dcvalue: Sharing cases and seeking second opinion consultations is an important part of everyday pathology practice Internet based communications and upcoming digital slide technologies have the potential to decrease barriers and open access to the best expertise We recently developed a dedicated Web based process for communication with outside practices seeking second opinion consultations The software allowed us to collect data about the current needs and use of a second opinion consultation practice a topic that has not been addressed in research studies thus far
Archives of pathology And laboratory medicine
A comprehensive analysis of a web-based dermatopathology second opinion consultation practice.
